subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Days after winning the P.G.A. Championship and a few days before the Barclays golf tournament, Rory McIlroy spent time teaching about 50 junior golfers in New York.
snippet: Days after winning the P.G.A. Championship and a few days before the Barclays golf tournament, Rory McIlroy spent time teaching about 50 junior golfers in New York.
